alert.note: Alert for Hyde; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 30 at 4:23PM EDT until April 30 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR WASHINGTON...NORTH CENTRAL CRAVEN...NORTHWESTERN HYDE... SOUTHEASTERN MARTIN AND CENTRAL BEAUFORT COUNTIES... At 423 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Plymouth to near Yeatesville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Belhaven, Sladesville, Ransomville, Ponzer, Scranton, Pinetown, Pungo, Pamlico Beach, Cayton, Edward, Cox Crossroads, Bonnerton, Wenona, Hinson, Bayview, Pike Road, Leechville, Winsteadville and Core Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
